title: HELL Have No Fury Like ...
body_text:
Unfinished Business at CXXXVIII
Would "Ghetta Superstar"
Diana DiBuccio
continue her nearly-three years of dominance in the sport she helped create? Or would the 2008 rookie sensation
Michelle Mullins
shut the self-appointed referee's mouth once and for all? The female foes were at it again, and this time there would be a winner.
Flash Results by Game
... DiBuccio: 1, 4, 5, 6; Mullins: 2, 3
It's not going to get more competitive - or unpredictable - than this women's war right here. When an astonishing 11 new participants arrived midway through, DiBuccio used the mass to gain the upper hand on this incredibly intense contest. Don't be shocked to these two meet again sometime down the road.
The Rules
: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match
: Diana DiBuccio defeated Michelle Mullins, 4 - 2, in a rematch from last week's DODGEBALL CXXXVII which had concluded in a draw.
Moments & Stars
: the multi-player "Charge!" from Team DiBuccio; Kevin Megill's Game 2 performance as well as Chris Everett's Game 7 showing; Darrell "Mr. T" Tronolone, father of John, collecting many of the overthrown dodgeballs on the outside of the court
Attendance
: 27, comprised of 21 men and 6 women.
New Players
: Matt Koscielski, Eric Stohrrea, Cat Berardi, Jay Kennedy, Mark Goss, Matt Pinfield, Dan Subers, Joe Perrino, Nick Beradi, Dan Barretto, Corey Lewis.
Other Notes
: The unreal number of new participants, 11, is the highest since DODGEBALL NINETY-4 in late-June 2007.
Captain Statistics
: DiBuccio 4-4-3 / Mullins 0-1-1. This was DiBuccio's 11th time in the captains chair, setting a new female record and only second overall to Chris Adams and John Tronolone both of whom have been in twelve contests.
Online Exclusive
Prior to the match, captains Mullins and DiBuccio agreed to keep their first two picks from the previous CXXXVII. As a result, Mullins teamed with Kevin Megill and John Tronolone again while DiBuccio remained with partners Kevin Adams and Ryan Letsche.
________________________________________
_________
DODGEBALL CXXX9
May 24, 2008
The surprises just keep on coming. For this 139th spectacle, team generals will not be announced via such traditional methods like right here on
dodgeball.livejournal.com
or perhaps more recently, the
EastCoastDodgeball TextMessagingService
. Instead, the only way to find out first hand is to attend CXXXIX this coming Saturday, May 24, to see what this end-of-the-season shocker turns out to be. But the "The Writer" isn't going to leave you clueless. It's a guarantee someone will not be leaving clean.
DODGEBALL CXL
"Family Affair"
May 31, 2008
The sights, the sounds, the action, and excitement. The warriors are less than two short weeks from
the
event of this hellacious 14th Season, DODGEBALL CXL. In the night's long-awaited main event, "Muffin Man"
Juan Londono
wages war with blocking magician
Justin Wolf
. A classic confrontation
players and parents
alike will certainly enjoy ... are your 'rents attending? Make sure they do - it's the "Family Affair" and it's only at DODGEBALL CXL beginning at 7pm!

Don't be shocked to these two meet again sometime down the road.

DODGEBALL CXXX9
May 24, 2008
The surprises just keep on coming. For this 139th spectacle, team generals will not be announced via such traditional methods like right here on dodgeball.livejournal.com or perhaps more recently, the EastCoastDodgeball TextMessagingService. Instead, the only way to find out first hand is to attend CXXXIX this coming Saturday, May 24, to see what this end-of-the-season shocker turns out to be. DODGEBALL CXL
"Family Affair"
May 31, 2008
The sights, the sounds, the action, and excitement. The warriors are less than two short weeks from the event of this hellacious 14th Season, DODGEBALL CXL. In the night's long-awaited main event, "Muffin Man" Juan Londono wages war with blocking magician Justin Wolf. A classic confrontation players and parents alike will certainly enjoy ... are your 'rents attending? Make sure they do - it's the "Family Affair" and it's only at DODGEBALL CXL beginning at 7pm!
